Review Title: It's really worth two stars and not just one now
Review Text:
! 

This restaurant is located in a beautiful hotel complex that looks like a Moroccan riad! Everything is extremely nice! 

This restaurant was one of the highlights of my trip to Majorca! Not only the extremely tasty cuisine, prepared in an open church, but above all the service, which creates a real friendship over time, as well as the cellar, with extremely interesting wines! 

The kitchen pays particular attention to kilometer 0 and interprets the classic Majorcan cuisine in a modern key! The products were all of excellent quality and the preparation was extremely skilful! But you have to accept the fact that, although the restaurant could be successful or even more so if it were located in the south of France, you do not expect the classic showcase cuisine that probably escaped in some comments in relation to the fact that the restaurant is expensive. Well, I live in Switzerland and therefore the price was worth everything, and even in Germany you have to pull out your pockets in some restaurants that cook very well but do not have oysters, lobsters or asparagus out of season! Inflation is not just a problem in Germany at the moment! 

You should also know that the menu with about 6 items already takes about 3 hours! The bigger one even more! On the other hand, the atmosphere and service are extremely fun and you can learn a lot about cooking, spices, wines and so on. 

A real favorite restaurant for me from now on

Review Title: It was not what we wanted, nor the right solution.
Review Text:
Several companions decided to make a gift voucher for two people, Mediterranean + classical harmony, for the price of 450 euros. The day they went to enjoy dinner, the maitre denied them part of the gift, saying that wine and cheese (classic harmony) were not included, so what was initially a gift, was an extra expense, since they had to pay for the wine.

The difference between what was paid and what was received was paid after a claim.

Our goal was to offer as a gift an excellent experience and what they received was a cold bank transfer, without even offering an apology.

It's worth getting carried away by the combination of surprising flavors! Very well prepared and excellent quality dishes. A very original and elegant presentation.
The service was very good... we were served by very attentive and professional waiters. The sommelier was very professional and got all the proposals right. The room director surprised us with the choice he made for the cheese board.... delicious! We let ourselves completely go and it was a very pleasant experience, in a quiet environment with beautiful views.
We are looking forward to repeating. It is one of the few restaurants that I have found that can surprise with Majorcan cuisine with an original touch and perfect combination of flavors; without failing to highlight the excellent professionalism of the room team and the kindness of the chef who came out to explain some dishes.

Excellent restaurant.  Amazing and interesting food.  Good atmosphere.  Staff friendly with just the right amount of interaction not to make it stuffy as it can be in some Michelin star restaurants.  
We had the Mediterranean Tasting menu without any add ins which was plenty and every course tasty.  
Would highly recommend
Very friendly staff - very nice location and the food is hard to describe in words: excellent, varied, fresh from the spot

Unfortunately we didn't had the full experience. After a very friendly welcome, we were escorted to our table. Soon followed some snacks and our aperitif. We chose menu extreme and the surprise could begin. We were served the dishes quickly, in my opinion much too quickly. It all tasted very good except for the pork fat croissant. This one was really too big and not our favourite. Unfortunately, my table companion did not feel well, no, that was not due to the food, so we ended the evening early. So we were not able to enjoy the full menu and ended the evening with a feeling of guilt. Fortunately, all understanding came from the staff and they were kind enough not to charge for the full menu. Which we offcourse would have fully understood if they had. I certainly hope to be able to return one day to fully experience it. I do have a point of attention. The portions are correspondingly quite large for the extensive menu you normally get. I would create more balance in that and definitely lower the pace. That went really too fast.

cambio de ubicación, cocina igual de mala e insipida.
El año pasado me juré que no me la volvería a colar, pero mi pareja insistió en ir porque conoce a la directora de Zoetry... y me la volvió a colar.
solo puedo decir, que este restaurante tiene una estrella porque tendrá buenos amigos en ese mundillo, y porque la puesta escena es buena, (hotel rural de Hyatt),  pero ni la comida ni el personal, son propios de una estrella michelin. 
Los platos son un despropósito tras otro, pretende innovar tanto, que es un sinsentido en su conjunto.
Decir que esto es representación de la cocina mallorquina, es un insulto a la cocina de Mallorca.
Vinos tremendamente inflados de precio, con un servicio de mesa muy mejorable, se hecha de menos el personal que tenía el año pasado, mucho mas rodado y profesional.

Review Title: Sublime experience - a one of a kind evening out
Review Text: I can’t overstate what a superb evening we had at this restaurant. Every aspect was perfection - from the minute we entered the restaurant to our very last morsel - the attention to detail is found everywhere. Each course presented another opportunity to outdo the one before and the journey through the culinary delights of Mallorcan food gave the menu a connection to local fare which was a highlight. Sebastian and Benjamin were attentive and deeply knowledgeable and we both left the evening determined to return.
Inigualable experiencia gastromica de la mano de Andreu genestra y su equipo,    creo wue ahora mismo es el maximo esponente de la cocina creativa en mallorca.......... brutalllllllllllll

El restaurante de Andreu Genestra consigue hacerte vivir una experiencia  única desde el inicio. Con una cuidada decoración y una cercana Bienvenida,comienza el viaje por varios sabores y presentaciones de platos llenos de creatividad, decoración y sabores únicos. Todo el recorrido gastronómico está cuidado hasta el último detalle y respaldado por un experto y amigable personal que complementan a la perfección toda la experiencia.
La cocina abierta al público, deja descubrir un ambiente distendido de sus profesionales a lo largo de todo el menú 
No deja de sorprender el nivel de detalle de sus elaboraciones. 
Sin duda un lugar para volver. 
Sorprendente saber que Andreu Genestra acepta retos y peticiones de sus comensales y no se deja encorsetar con su propuesta. Acepta hacer felices a sus comensales bajo peticiones puntuales de los mismos. Lo que denota gran humildad y flexibilidad. Que nadie dude en probarlo 
Volveremos !!!!

Review Title: No es de estrella michelín, pésimo
Review Text:
El entorno en el que está situado el hotel es idílico, un lugar tranquilo para desconectar con tu familia o amigos.
En cuanto al restaurante, bonita decoración y muy buen servicio del personal pero la comida deja mucho que desear y no es para nada de un chef con Estrella Michelin. Mencionar a Dani, el sommelier, por su gracia y buen trabajo.
Para empezar, la mayoría de los platos llegaron fríos, el calamar duro, las salsas insípidas y los postres muy decepcionantes, no estaban nada dulces, quieren innovar tanto que no saben que hacer ya. En cuanto a los petit fours estaban realmente malos, una combinación de sabores que no hay por donde cogerla. En fin un menú carísimo que no disfrutamos para nada, perdimos el dinero.

Un restaurante espectacular, el personal de sala es muy cordial, profesional y atento a los detalles sobre todos porque muchos platos se sirven en la mesa.
Hemos decidido de probar el menu Mediterráneo y nos gusto mucho el juego de gustos entre dulce y salado.
Hay platos que tienen sabores unicos como por ejemplo el pato&mejillones, No puedes explicarlo, tienes que probarlo.

Ich habe vor Monaten für dieses Restaurant reserviert um dort mit meiner Frau unseren zehnten Hochzeitstag zu verbringen.
Aus diesem Grund habe ich ebenfalls das Hotel mit gebucht und die entsprechenden Flüge nach Mallorca.
Es sollte die perfekte Überraschung für meine Frau sein.
Zwei Tage vor dem Essen wurde mir die Reservierung für das Restaurant abgesagt.
Ich bin auf den Koch und das Restaurant durch meinen langjährigen Freund, welcher selbst 2 Michelin Sterne hat, aufmerksam geworden.
Nun werde ich dies natürlich weiter geben, da ein solcher Umgang mit Gästen nicht mal einen Google Stern wert ist, geschweige einen von Michelin.
Ich bin mir auch sicher das dies für den Guide Michelin Konsequenzen hat.
Ich möchte hier nur kurz die Anmerkung machen das es dem Manager völlig egal war das ich bereits ein gewisses Vermögen für Flüge und Hotel sowie meinen eigenen Urlaub investiert habe.
Wir lieben diese Küche, und feiern hier gemeinsam die Liebe zu einem geistreichen Umgang lokaler Produkte und der höchsten Kunst es geschmacklich wirklich toll zuzubereiten. Geheimtipp. Psst.!
Geniales Dinner mit einer sehr guten Auswahl an hochkarätigen Gängen. Gute Weine und eine vorzügliche Käse Auswahl wurden ebenfalls genossen. Andreu ist unkompliziert, hoch kompetent, Hut ab!

Una experiencia fantástica. Situado en un lugar de ensueño, disfrutamos del menú degustación corto. La variedad de los platos y mezcla de sabores es extraordinaria. Toda la cena fue perfecta donde todo el mundo es muy atento y agradable y la cordialidad de Andreu Genestra presentando sus platos fue una maravilla. 
Recomendadísimo para disfrutar de una experiencia diferente y inigualable.

Un lugar excepcional para vivir una experiencia gastronómica inolvidable. 
Pudimos disfrutar de una maravillosa combinación de sabores, unidos al increíble trato del personal. Cada plato, además de delicioso, está tratado con muchísimo cuidado y cariño, algo que se puede observar ya que la cocina está abierta para poder disfrutar de la experiencia al completo. Sin duda, ¡volveremos a repetir!
Hübsche Restaurant, nettes Personal und ganz tolle Küche. Hatten ein vegetarisches Gourmetmenue. Waren überrascht wie toll das schmecken kann!

Von Anfang bis zum Schluß großartig. Ein kulinarischer Genuss, tolles Personal und ein Sommelier der seinen Beruf liebt. Aufmerksam von einem zuvorkommenden Service den ganzen Abend umsorgt, fantastische Speisen kunstvoll angerichtet und geschmacklich auf sehr hohem Niveau zubereitet. Das Porzellan ist mallorquin jeder Gang kreativ neu angerichtet. Feinschmecker Was willst du mehr. Ein großartiger Abend der auch am nächsten Tag noch präsent ist.

Review Title: Unmet Cuisine Expectations and Poor Service
Review Text:
Prior to visiting Andreu Genestra, we were excited to try the tasting menu and the hyper-locally produced dishes. 

However, our expectations weren't met. The restaurant's head server was far from obliging, which is rare in a Michelin-rated restaurant. We've never experienced such arrogance or inability to be flexible whatsoever. We almost left before ordering, which we deeply regret not doing. 

Since we saw the sommelier greeting tables with such positivity, we ordered the wine pairing but were disappointed when our table didn't receive the same treatment and attention as others nearby. 

While the dishes on the tasting menu were stunningly presented, they lacked flavor and inspiration with some dishes relying on a heavy dose of salt as the main seasoning. During the service, we felt that the pacing between menu items was hurried and didn't give us time to enjoy the outside atmosphere. 

A friendlier staff would have slightly enhanced our experience, but in conclusion, we had higher expectations for a night that cost 500 EUR.

Visitamos el restaurante de Andreu Genestra para cenar el pasado mes de Julio.
Elegimos el menú degustación más breve, para cuatro personas
Todo allí fue excelente, empezando por el delicioso jardín mediterráneo donde se ubican las mesas, exquisita cocina ,sofisticada pero con marcado carácter local , y el servicio exquisito del personal ,encabezado por el mismo Andreu, que nos atendió con enorme profesionalidad y simpatia ,haciendonos sentir como en casa .
Absolutamente a repetir lo antes posible.

Quite simply a gastronomic extravaganza!….Our second visit 6 years on…it did not disappoint….we went for the 12 courses and only just managed to finish everything!…From the waitresses,the sommelier,the manager and to Andreu himself,everybody was so pleasant and attentive…a fabulous evening !

Menù degustazione 8 portate eccezionale, sapori particolari ed interessanti, prodotti locali, straconsigliato!
Servizio attento e preciso, senza essere stucchevole.
Nota di merito alle melanzane, da favola.
Il prezzo è assolutamente ragionevole in rapporto alla qualità del menù e del servizio.
Straconsigliato!

Review Title: Girandola di sapori, con semplicità. Territorio e sperimentazione
Review Text:
Agosto 2022
Si cena all'aperto, in una struttura curata ma informale e silenziosa.
Una decina di tavoli.
Come sempre facciamo,  abbiamo scelto il menù degustazione ""mediterranean extreme". 11 portate (13 con benvenuto dello chef e piccola pasticceria finale)
La prima parte è fatta di 2 piatti intensi, che comunicano subito l'impronta contadina e lo spirito del casaro che anima l'entroterra maiorchino. 
 Ad esempio   l'Aubergine Couland è un piatto dal forte gusto, ricco , sapido che ti fa rivivere le terre assolate e brulle del centro di Maiorca, ricche di verdure, olio, aromi.
Poi secondo un perfetto percorso logico, si scende verso il mare ...i piatti diventano più leggeri, in un mix bilanciato di mare e terra 
Le due portate "Seafood and veal" e "rabbit with anchovy" mostrano il contadino che tende la mano al pescatore, sono la perfetta sintesi dei contrasti dell'isola che sanno amalgamarsi alla perfezione. Delicatezza e gusto, con personalità e innovazione. Tutto un gioco di opposti e consistenze diverse.
Anche "Mussel Duck" ne è un esempio.
Si prosegue con due portate prevalentemente di mare e si finisce il pasto principale guardando a oriente con un gustosissimo kebab.
La pasticceria apre con due portate molto leggere e che puliscono il palato, dando freschezza dopo un percorso estremamente abbondante.
Si finisce con un dolce Chocolate Press, a dir poco divino in cui a sapori vegetali e al ciccolato si combina il tartufo. Spettacolare al gusto e nell'impiattamento. Il ruolo di questo piatto a mio avviso, è una sorta di "recap" -come si fa alla fine di un meeting- per lasciare il ricordo finale dello chef : la cucina dello chef è una girandola di sapori che nascono dalla terra e che si ingentiliscono e arricchiscono con elementi "esterni", in una sintesi di perfetta armonia.
Uno chef "pensatore" che con ogni piatto cerca sempre di comunicare qualcosa. Ogni piatto è un'ode al territorio di Maiorca in cui le varie anime del contadino, del pastore e del pescatore si mescolano, con uno sguardo a tutto il mediterraneo, a testimonianza di come un 'isola con una lunga tradizione di commerci e contaminazioni, non può che essere aperta ad accogliere il nuovo, il diverso.
Anche i colori dei piatti rivelano una mente artistica non banale, sono tutti improntati al territorio, scuri, caldi, solari, con prevalenza di rossi, marroni, il verde scuro della vegetazione.
Anche il sommelier di sala è uno sperimentatore: suggerisce con acume alcuni abbinamenti coragggiosi: bravo!
Servizio giovane, attento con qualche piccola sbavatura (es abbiamo dovuto chiedere il menù, il sommelier non sapeva il nostro menù, alla fine dopo il conto siamo stati un po' abbandonati, ecc)

Otroligt god mat där två av maträtterna var helt sagolika. Avsmakningsmenyn är verkligen att rekommendera. Sommelieren var inspirerande, kunnig och hade hittat så rätt. Serveringen var på topp. Inte det billigaste stället men mer än väl värt varje euro.
